title: Minimal UI Go Nova Apex Theme v1.9 - Pulsate
description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ybFluGR.png[/img]

This is NOT a standalone app, you need a launcher such as Go, Apex, Nova, etc that allow custom themes.

Installation:
Install Go Launcher, Apex, or Nova (all free in the Play Store)
Install this theme
Find Minimal UI in any of the launcher's theme settings, then apply.
What's in this version: (Updated : Jul 16, 2013)
Added 46 icons. 

Icons are now sorted alphabetically. Includes letter dividers if using Nova launcher.
Cleaned up & fixed some icons.
Required Android O/S : 2.2+
